trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for dynamically mapping types to and from <see langword="xsi:type" /> representations during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种机制，用于在序列化和反序列化期间在类型和 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 表示形式之间动态进行相互映射。

trans-unit.source: Developers should be careful about what data is being sent over the wire.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员应谨慎正在通过网络发送的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use transport or message security to secure that data.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用传输或消息安全保护该数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see see [Security](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/security-in-wcf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/security-in-wcf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> if you are completely sure of what information is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver>如果确实完全的哪些信息正在序列化。

trans-unit.source: Malicious types can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 恶意类型可能导致意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to derive a class from <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> 派生类。

trans-unit.source: For a working sample, see [DataContractResolver](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontractresolver.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关工作示例，请参阅[DataContractResolver](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontractresolver.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="xsi:type" /> name to map.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 名称。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="xsi:type" /> namespace to map.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The type declared in the data contract.
trans-unit.target: 在数据协定中声明的类型。

trans-unit.source: The known type resolver.
trans-unit.target: 已知类型的解析器。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to map the specified <see langword="xsi:type" /> name and namespace to a data contract type during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间，重写此方法以将指定的 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 名称和命名空间映射到数据协定类型。

trans-unit.source: The type the <see langword="xsi:type" /> name and namespace is mapped to.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="xsi:type" /> 名称和命名空间映射到的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the known type resolution logic inside your implementation, a reference to it is passed in as the `knownTypeResolver` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要在您的实现内使用已知类型的解析逻辑，则对它的引用将会作为 `knownTypeResolver` 参数传入。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver.ResolveName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver.ResolveName%2A> 方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: The type to map.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type declared in the data contract.
trans-unit.target: 在数据协定中声明的类型。

trans-unit.source: The known type resolver.
trans-unit.target: 已知类型的解析器。

trans-unit.source: The xsi:type name.
trans-unit.target: xsi:type 名称。

trans-unit.source: The xsi:type namespace.
trans-unit.target: xsi:type 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to map a data contract type to an <see langword="xsi:type" /> name and namespace during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化期间，重写此方法以将数据协定类型映射到 <see langword="xsi:type" /> 名称和命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if mapping succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果映射成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the known type resolution logic inside your implementation, a reference to it is passed in as the `knownTypeResolver` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要在您的实现内使用已知类型的解析逻辑，则对它的引用将会作为 `knownTypeResolver` 参数传入。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver.TryResolveType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver.TryResolveType%2A> 方法的实现。
